name: Sales Panic !
description:
When you need to reach objects but you are too small... but you can use chairs !

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • H - Highlight collectible items
  • E - Pick up/collect
  • Left click : Rotate object
  • Right click : Launch object
  • Mouse wheel : Move object away/close to you

Thanks to :

plaggy, gamekorp, CraigSnedeker - Props
